name: PicoECS demo
description:
Arrow keys: move,   X: talk

A very short demo showcasing features of a prototype ECS framework in Pico-8, with additional systems such as y-sorting, map layers, and dialogue.

The source for the project and a custom build system can be found at: https://github.com/rajin-s/PicoECS

Music from '9 songs in pico-8' by Robby Duguay

Made for the Gamedev@IU May 2019 Weekend Jam
